item.description:
Ciao a tutti!

This is the final update for this Sunday's (May 5) Family-Style Multi-Course Lunch @ Pasta Beach followed by the Italian Movie 'La giusta distanza' @ Caffe Paradiso.

At this point, there are approximately 20 of us going (including Italian students, Italian teachers and Meetup Members).  There is room for about 5 more people,

The plan has changed slightly, in that there will be only one showing of the movie 'La giusta distanza'.  Originally we were planning on showing the movie twice, once before lunch and then once after lunch, but now, the movie will be shown ONLY after lunch.

Lunch will begin at 2:00 pm @ Pasta Beach (30 Rowes Wharf, Boston - located not far from the Aquarium).  After lunch, we will walk (or drive) to the North End to Caffe` Paradiso (255 Hanover Street) where we will watch the movie downstairs in the classroom/viewing room.

For lunch @ Pasta Beach, we will be served a variety of "antipasti"; "primi" and "secondi" including a "contorno".....Soft drinks (fountain drinks) will be included...Alcohol is extra.

**SEE THE MENU AT THE BOTTOM OF THIS PAGE**

The movie at Caffe` Paradiso will be shown on the huge screen with surround-sound stereo speakers. The movies will include English Subtitles. Before the movie begins you will be served your choice of coffee (espresso, macchiato, marocchino, american coffee) or tea as well as a dessert (mini-cannolo or a biscotto).

Information about the movie 'La giusta Distanza' (one of the top rated Italian movies of 2007) can be seen here:

http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0951279/

TOTAL COST IS A VERY REASONABLE $40 for EVERYTHING

Information about this event and payment information can be found on the 'Events' page of my website:

http://italianprogram.com/events/upcoming-events.html

Payment via Paypal must be made before the event:

http://italianprogram.com/pay-online/events-online-payment.html

if you wish to attend this event or if you have any immediate questions, feel free to contact me ASAP, at italianprogram@gmail.com and/or call me at 617-233-9876.....I will need your name, email address and cell phone number.

Parking is free and plentiful all day on Sunday in the downtown areas, Financial District, along Atlantic Avenue, along the Waterfront and in the North End.

John

 

**MENU FOR PASTA BEACH**


ANTIPASTI

  • 3 Assorted Bruschetta (tomatoes & basil, parmesan cheese, asparagus mousse & buffalo mozzarella)
  • Napoletana salad w/ balsamic dressing (arugula, baked eggplant, fresh mozzarella)
  • Prosciutto from Parma, Coppa from Parma & Mortadella from Bologna
  • Pizza Margherita
  • Pizza Capricciosa

PRIMI

  • Orecchiette pasta tossed with basil, tomatoes sauce & mixed vegetables sauce
  • Fresh Tortellini pasta stuffed with meat sautéed in butter, cream & fresh thyme


SECONDI

  • Chicken Scaloppine cooked with asparagus, mushroom, parsley & Chardonnay wine sauce
  • Salmone alla griglia – grilled salmon fillet
